title: With Ruble’s Decline, Russian Tourists Gain Appreciation for the Motherland
text: BING NEWS: With Ruble’s Decline, Russian Tourists Gain Appreciation for the Motherland VYATSKOYE, Russia — The tourists streamed out of the tall white bus onto an asphalt parking lot in the middle of this spruced-up village.
